00008 void b3PlaneSpace1 (b3Float4ConstArg n, b3Float4* p, b3Float4* q);
00009  void b3PlaneSpace1 (b3Float4ConstArg n, b3Float4* p, b3Float4* q)
00010 {
00011   if (b3Fabs(n.z) > 0.70710678f) {
00012     // choose p in y-z plane
00013     float a = n.y*n.y + n.z*n.z;
00014     float k = 1.f/sqrt(a);
00015     p[0].x = 0;
00016         p[0].y = -n.z*k;
00017         p[0].z = n.y*k;
00018     // set q = n x p
00019     q[0].x = a*k;
00020         q[0].y = -n.x*p[0].z;
00021         q[0].z = n.x*p[0].y;
00022   }
00023   else {
00024     // choose p in x-y plane
00025     float a = n.x*n.x + n.y*n.y;
00026     float k = 1.f/sqrt(a);
00027     p[0].x = -n.y*k;
00028         p[0].y = n.x*k;
00029         p[0].z = 0;
00030     // set q = n x p
00031     q[0].x = -n.z*p[0].y;
00032         q[0].y = n.z*p[0].x;
00033         q[0].z = a*k;
00034   }
00035 }

00038  
00039 void setLinearAndAngular( b3Float4ConstArg n, b3Float4ConstArg r0, b3Float4ConstArg r1, b3Float4* linear, b3Float4* angular0, b3Float4* angular1)
00040 {
00041         *linear = b3MakeFloat4(n.x,n.y,n.z,0.f);
00042         *angular0 = b3Cross3(r0, n);
00043         *angular1 = -b3Cross3(r1, n);
00044 }

00046 
00047 float calcRelVel( b3Float4ConstArg l0, b3Float4ConstArg l1, b3Float4ConstArg a0, b3Float4ConstArg a1, b3Float4ConstArg linVel0,
00048         b3Float4ConstArg angVel0, b3Float4ConstArg linVel1, b3Float4ConstArg angVel1 )
00049 {
00050         return b3Dot3F4(l0, linVel0) + b3Dot3F4(a0, angVel0) + b3Dot3F4(l1, linVel1) + b3Dot3F4(a1, angVel1);
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 float calcJacCoeff(b3Float4ConstArg linear0, b3Float4ConstArg linear1, b3Float4ConstArg angular0, b3Float4ConstArg angular1,
00055                                         float invMass0, const b3Mat3x3* invInertia0, float invMass1, const b3Mat3x3* invInertia1)
00056 {
00057         //      linear0,1 are normlized
00058         float jmj0 = invMass0;//b3Dot3F4(linear0, linear0)*invMass0;
00059         float jmj1 = b3Dot3F4(mtMul3(angular0,*invInertia0), angular0);
00060         float jmj2 = invMass1;//b3Dot3F4(linear1, linear1)*invMass1;
00061         float jmj3 = b3Dot3F4(mtMul3(angular1,*invInertia1), angular1);
00062         return -1.f/(jmj0+jmj1+jmj2+jmj3);
00063 }

00066 void setConstraint4( b3Float4ConstArg posA, b3Float4ConstArg linVelA, b3Float4ConstArg angVelA, float invMassA, b3Mat3x3ConstArg invInertiaA,
00067         b3Float4ConstArg posB, b3Float4ConstArg linVelB, b3Float4ConstArg angVelB, float invMassB, b3Mat3x3ConstArg invInertiaB, 
00068         __global struct b3Contact4Data* src, float dt, float positionDrift, float positionConstraintCoeff,
00069         b3ContactConstraint4_t* dstC )
00070 {
00071         dstC->m_bodyA = abs(src->m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit);
00072         dstC->m_bodyB = abs(src->m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit);
00073 
00074         float dtInv = 1.f/dt;
00075         for(int ic=0; ic<4; ic++)
00076         {
00077                 dstC->m_appliedRambdaDt[ic] = 0.f;
00078         }
00079         dstC->m_fJacCoeffInv[0] = dstC->m_fJacCoeffInv[1] = 0.f;
00080 
00081 
00082         dstC->m_linear = src->m_worldNormalOnB;
00083         dstC->m_linear.w = 0.7f ;//src->getFrictionCoeff() );
00084         for(int ic=0; ic<4; ic++)
00085         {
00086                 b3Float4 r0 = src->m_worldPosB[ic] - posA;
00087                 b3Float4 r1 = src->m_worldPosB[ic] - posB;
00088 
00089                 if( ic >= src->m_worldNormalOnB.w )//npoints
00090                 {
00091                         dstC->m_jacCoeffInv[ic] = 0.f;
00092                         continue;
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 float relVelN;
00096                 {
00097                         b3Float4 linear, angular0, angular1;
00098                         setLinearAndAngular(src->m_worldNormalOnB, r0, r1, &linear, &angular0, &angular1);
00099 
00100                         dstC->m_jacCoeffInv[ic] = calcJacCoeff(linear, -linear, angular0, angular1,
00101                                 invMassA, &invInertiaA, invMassB, &invInertiaB );
00102 
00103                         relVelN = calcRelVel(linear, -linear, angular0, angular1,
00104                                 linVelA, angVelA, linVelB, angVelB);
00105 
00106                         float e = 0.f;//src->getRestituitionCoeff();
00107                         if( relVelN*relVelN < 0.004f ) e = 0.f;
00108 
00109                         dstC->m_b[ic] = e*relVelN;
00110                         //float penetration = src->m_worldPosB[ic].w;
00111                         dstC->m_b[ic] += (src->m_worldPosB[ic].w + positionDrift)*positionConstraintCoeff*dtInv;
00112                         dstC->m_appliedRambdaDt[ic] = 0.f;
00113                 }
00114         }
00115 
00116         if( src->m_worldNormalOnB.w > 0 )//npoints
00117         {       //      prepare friction
00118                 b3Float4 center = b3MakeFloat4(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);
00119                 for(int i=0; i<src->m_worldNormalOnB.w; i++) 
00120                         center += src->m_worldPosB[i];
00121                 center /= (float)src->m_worldNormalOnB.w;
00122 
00123                 b3Float4 tangent[2];
00124                 b3PlaneSpace1(src->m_worldNormalOnB,&tangent[0],&tangent[1]);
00125                 
00126                 b3Float4 r[2];
00127                 r[0] = center - posA;
00128                 r[1] = center - posB;
00129 
00130                 for(int i=0; i<2; i++)
00131                 {
00132                         b3Float4 linear, angular0, angular1;
00133                         setLinearAndAngular(tangent[i], r[0], r[1], &linear, &angular0, &angular1);
00134 
00135                         dstC->m_fJacCoeffInv[i] = calcJacCoeff(linear, -linear, angular0, angular1,
00136                                 invMassA, &invInertiaA, invMassB, &invInertiaB );
00137                         dstC->m_fAppliedRambdaDt[i] = 0.f;
00138                 }
00139                 dstC->m_center = center;
00140         }
00141 
00142         for(int i=0; i<4; i++)
00143         {
00144                 if( i<src->m_worldNormalOnB.w )
00145                 {
00146                         dstC->m_worldPos[i] = src->m_worldPosB[i];
00147                 }
00148                 else
00149                 {
00150                         dstC->m_worldPos[i] = b3MakeFloat4(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);
00151                 }
00152         }
00153 }
